channel.title: Test Feed - Future Notifications
channel.description: Test feed with future-dated items for timezone testing

item.title: Future Update 16:00 CEST
item.description: This article should be scheduled for future notification at 16:00 local time (14:00 UTC). Current time: 15:34 CEST.

item.description: This article should be scheduled for future notification at 16:15 local time (14:15 UTC).

item.title: Past Update 15:00 CEST
item.description: This article has a past pubDate and should be processed immediately (12:00 UTC = 14:00 CEST past).
